# [FEAT] Custom Roles

## Labels
`user-management`, `security`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement custom roles to create tailored permission sets beyond standard roles.

## Requirements

### Custom Role Creation
- Create roles from scratch
- Clone existing roles
- Role naming and description
- Active/inactive status

### Permission Categories
- Ticket access
- User management
- Settings access
- Reporting access
- Knowledge base access
- Automation access
- Integration access

### Granular Permissions
- Create tickets
- Edit tickets
- Delete tickets
- Assign tickets
- View all tickets vs. group tickets
- Manage users
- Manage triggers/automations
- Access admin settings
- Export data

### Role Management
- Role list view
- Edit role permissions
- Delete custom roles
- View role members
- Role usage audit

### Ticket Access Levels
- All tickets
- Group tickets only
- Assigned tickets only
- Organization tickets only
- Custom access rules

## Zendesk Reference
On Enterprise plans, you can create custom agent roles to fit your team's workflow with specific permissions like ticket access and management.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Custom role creation works
- [ ] All permission types available
- [ ] Role assignment functional
- [ ] Ticket access levels work
- [ ] Role audit available
